msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I kinda like having on my jog route, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's awesome hurdle practice!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="10" />What a mushroom! Oh, it's just that's kinda mushroom-ish.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That'sa lot less impressive than the real deal. Still pretty cool, though!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Sohow are you supposed to keep
from melting, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is making me way too calm to work out! ARGH!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is getting me in the mood to build something.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />One of these days, I wanna get some wood together and make my own climbing gym, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Who's leaving old stuff around? This is a good way to break !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />If there were a school with outside, my brain would get ripped!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Oh, but if it rained, all my work would get wet. No good
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> really gives my jogging route that luxury feel.<20_3 arg="3" />
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is for work-work, not working out. I'm not cool with that.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> outdoors? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's, like, outdoors squared!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> is supposed to be "cute," right?Someone called me "cute" once <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Do you think they meant I looked like ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Fruit after a workout is great, but <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" /> isn't what I had in mind.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Just about every time I go by , <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wanna go on a road trip.
<20_2 arg="10" /> really takes me back<20_3 arg="6" />

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Cool! It's like being in the middle of the ocean.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, I'm on an island, which is in the middle of the ocean, but just MORE in the middle! Ha ha ha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I really love the big-city feel gives the island.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I bet if I lived in a city, could I go to a new gym every day, Whoa! That'd be awesome!
